title: Restore user content lost after draft app expiration

requirements.text: Restore all user-added content (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom quotes, resources, and cybercrime articles) that was present before the draft app expired

quotes: It's working fine. I just lost my progress from before it expired

acceptanceCriteria: All previously uploaded articles are visible in the Latest Progress tab
All previously uploaded X posts are visible in the X Posts tab
All previously added spotlights are visible in the Ecosystem Spotlight tab
All previously added wisdom quotes are visible in the Investing Wisdom tab
All previously added resources are visible in the Trusted Resources tab
All previously added cybercrime articles are visible in the Cybercrime Awareness tab

constraints: Do not modify the existing UI components or frontend architecture
Preserve all existing functionality and user workflows
Maintain the current backend CRUD API structure
nonGoals: Implementing new features beyond data restoration
Modifying the visual design or layout
